collapsibleContent: Within the THE4 project hub, you'll find AI applications crafted by creative teams from all over the world. Just by using these apps you can enjoy state-of-the-art AI capabilities, and whenever you decide to support(including use) a project with tokens, you instantly move from being "just a user" to becoming an investor and a co-owner of the community's value. Over time, these rights tokens may also unlock upside you didn't expect.
